A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Chewbacca: used only for punchlines. Rey: talking to herself\, looking in funhouse mirrors. Luke: grumpy old man\, killed off. Poe: brash idiot\, gets people killed. Ackbar: killed off screen. Phasma: zero development\, killed off. Snoke: zero development\, killed off. 

Somehow seeing BB-8 piloting a scout walker even made me hate BB-8.

What emotion-rich action are critics referring to? Outside of that one amazing lightsaber fight\, I was bored and angry. The whole movie felt sloppy and disjointed from everything that came before\, and a big FU to anyone who cares about these characters.
